description: Ergonomic wireless mouse with 2.4 GHz connectivity and adjustable DPI settings.
Durable mechanical keyboard with RGB backlighting and anti-ghosting keys.
Surround sound gaming headset with noise-canceling microphone and soft ear cushions.
Fast charging USB-C cable with braided design for extra durability.
High-speed portable SSD with USB 3.2 Gen 2 for fast data transfer.
